title: Spies Like Us
description:
Frank is joined by veteran national security reporter, former spy, founder of SpyTalk to answer: What makes a good spy? Has the art of espionage changed in the digital age? And more!

Follow Jeff Stein:
https://twitter.com/SpyTalker
https://www.spytalk.co/

Follow Frank on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/FrankFigliuzzi1
